entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 505,483,717,000 reported in the network role http://www.americamovil.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 505,125,277,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.americamovil.com/role/ConsolidatedStatementsOfChangesInShareholdersEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2022-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : MXN Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -3 Decimals of Equity : -3 Rule version: 26.0.9 - d855868d20f.htm 9827
